_header: On twelfth day came kings three
_description: James Ryman, an Epiphany carol — six quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘Beholde to you gret joy I bring / For owe is born crist heuen king’

CULEe112.First Lines:
On xiithe day camme kingis threWith golde encense and
                    myrre so fre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffor this chielde crist that is certayneThe son of god &
                    heven king

Zupitza,  Julius,
